SEARCH
Package HW2

Interface Hand<C>

Type Parameters:
C - the type of elements in the hand
All Known Implementing Classes:
HandImpl
public interface Hand<C>
Represents a hand of cards that can hold various types of elements.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Hand<C>
    add(C c)
    Adds an element to the hand.
    Hand<C>
    discard(int index)
    Discards an element at the specified index from the hand.

    Finds the index of the first occurrence of a specific element in the hand.
    C
    get(int index)
    Retrieves the element at the specified index from the hand.

    Returns a subset of the hand based on a predicate.
    <D> Hand<D>
    getMap(Function<C,D> f)
    Maps the elements in the hand to a different type using a function.

    Returns the number of elements currently in the hand.

    Checks if the hand is empty.

    Sorts the hand based on a comparison function.

  • Method Details

    • add

      Hand<C> add(C c)
      Adds an element to the hand.
      Parameters:
      c - the element to add
      Returns:
      the hand with the added element

    • discard

      Hand<C> discard(int index)
      Discards an element at the specified index from the hand.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the element to discard
      Returns:
      the hand without the discarded element

    • get

      C get(int index)
      Retrieves the element at the specified index from the hand.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the element to retrieve
      Returns:
      the element at the specified index

    • getSize

      int getSize()
      Returns the number of elements currently in the hand.
      Returns:
      the size of the hand

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the hand is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the hand is empty, false otherwise

    • find

      int find(C c)
      Finds the index of the first occurrence of a specific element in the hand.
      Parameters:
      c - the element to find
      Returns:
      the index of the element if found, -1 otherwise

    • sortHand

      void sortHand(Comparator<C> comparator)
      Sorts the hand based on a comparison function.
      Parameters:
      comparator - the function used for comparison

    • getHand

      Hand<C> getHand(Predicate<C> filter)
      Returns a subset of the hand based on a predicate.
      Parameters:
      filter - the predicate used for filtering
      Returns:
      a subset of the hand

    • rankSum

      int rankSum()
      Calculates the sum of ranks of the cards in the hand.
      Returns:
      the sum of ranks

    • getMap

      <D> Hand<D> getMap(Function<C,D> f)
      Maps the elements in the hand to a different type using a function.
      Type Parameters:
      D - the type of elements after mapping
      Parameters:
      f - the mapping function
      Returns:
      a new hand with elements of type D
